p: Certain characteristics, emotions, mental states, which have a more detrimental effect on mental health and COVID-19 will definitely affect if the person has a history of anxiety or Generalized Anxiety Disorder. Naturally, the prevalence of psychological problems is significantly higher among them whose friends and family members got infected or died of COVID-19. Apart from that, confirmed patients have the fear of being isolated from the society which linked with the shame of infecting others could trigger the mental illness. That is why this study recommends merging vulnerable group in the treatment plan.
